pullrequest.title: [gz11] Add copy/move constructors and assignment operator to Geometry

content.raw:
yeah, `<any>` isn't included in the high sierra version of xcode. we'll have to wait for mojave to compile sdformat's gz11 branch on macOS

we do have a mojave machine, so I created a sdformat CI job for it:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64-mojave/

the machine is currently offline though while it updates its software. I need to ask @\_jrivero_ how to get it to reconnect automatically when it reboots because it doesn't seem to do that
content.html:
yeah, <any> isn't included in the high sierra version of xcode. we'll have to wait for mojave to compile sdformat's gz11 branch on macOS

we do have a mojave machine, so I created a sdformat CI job for it:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64-mojave/

the machine is currently offline though while it updates its software. I need to ask @_jrivero_ how to get it to reconnect automatically when it reboots because it doesn't seem to do that
